reviews.review_msg: Great professor! Really took the time to break down the steps on writing an academic paper and helped guide all the students along the journey. The first few weeks of class started off slow, but soon picked up near the end but was always available for providing feedback. Used many different activities to facilitate different learning styles.

Passive aggressive/inauthentic. She built a career on the backs of Indigenous knowledge holders but refuses to acknowledge her racial privileges. She is only looking out for her own interests, and is super self involved. She plays favourites in gross ways, and belittles her own grad students. Will make you feel terrible, don't study with her.
